class.rdfs:comment: The act of taking money from a buyer in exchange for goods or services rendered. An agent sells an object, product, or service to a buyer for a price. Reciprocal of BuyAction.
class.rdfs:label: SellAction

schema:buyer.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The participant/person/organization that bought the object.
schema:buyer.rdfs:label: buyer

schema:warrantyPromise.rdfs:comment: The warranty promise(s) included in the offer.
schema:warrantyPromise.rdfs:label: warrantyPromise
